Body:
s = spectrographs.keck_deimos.KeckDEIMOSSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'keck_deimos', '830G_L_8400', 'd0914_0002.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Keck DEIMOS read.'
det = 2
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (4096, 2128)
assert bpm.shape == (4096, 2048)
dev_suite_required
